org.artoolkit.ar6.base.rendering.gles20

Class BaseShaderProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.artoolkit.ar6.base.rendering.gles20.ShaderProgram
      • org.artoolkit.ar6.base.rendering.gles20.BaseShaderProgram

  • public class BaseShaderProgram
extends ShaderProgram
    The shader program links together the vertex shader and the fragment shader and compiles them. It also is responsible for binding the attributes. Attributes can be used to pass in values to the shader during runtime.

    Finally it renders the given geometry.

      • render

        public void render(float[] position)
        Description copied from class: ShaderProgram
        Only render a simple position. In this case the implementation if forwarded to the ShaderProgram.render(FloatBuffer, FloatBuffer, ByteBuffer) but you can override this one directly as shown in BaseShaderProgram
        Overrides:
        render in class ShaderProgram
        Parameters:
        position - The position to be rendered
